name: Welcome to Orochi Park
description:
An interactive fiction adventure-strategy parody. Send agents on missions, build your base, research superweapons and buy units. Along the way, unlock occult mysteries. Plus romance Kelly from Mass Effect. You can play the demo for free. The full game releases 2019.Key Features
  • A parody of Mass Effect and The Secret World
  • Deep adventure-strategy gameplay
  • Detailed interactive fiction
A Parody of Mass Effect and The Secret World
Romance Kelly from Mass Effect and BioWare's Favorite Redhead (definitely not the same person). Solve conspiracy-laden occult mysteries. Resist the urge to buy Conan Exiles.Deep Adventure-Strategy Gameplay
Every turn, send agents to gather weapons and forge alliances. Set strategic priorities in the doomsday bunker in five locations - the War Room, the Armoury, the Barracks, the Library and the Black Market.Detailed interactive fiction
Welcome to Orochi Park features detailed art and a compelling story that's fully voice acted. Hundreds of strategic choices lead to 20 color-coded endings. All slightly different.
